entry.title: $2525 // True 1 BR Top Floor/Penthouse - Upper East Side - APRIL 1
entry.content:
I am moving out and looking for someone to take over my lease of my 1 BR apartment on 61st and 2nd in upper east.

True 1 bedroom with full bath, full stainless fridge, stainless gas stove, granite counter, and new hardwood floors!

APRIL 1st is preferred move-in date, but I will also consider March 1st or May 1st as well (no mid-month options available). You'll need to apply through the company website and attach required documents and be approved.

No laundry in bldg but there's an .85/lb wash & fold around the corner which is great. It's a quiet place and you can't hear neighbors. 5th floor walk up (no elevator). Everything in unit works fine. NO realtor fee. 1st month + security will be due for move-in.

Email me with any questions and to schedule a viewing of the unit. Thanks!

Tags:
UES
Midtown east
